title: Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay Rulebook 1st Edition - Corrected Vers
description:
Warhammer Fantasy RolePlay Rulebook 1st Edition ( Fully Corrected )
===================================================================

Format: PDF of scanned pages
Language: English
First Published: 1986


This is a PDF of the 1st edition rules for Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay.

It has been created from an existing scan that has been floating around the interwebs for a while, but I have;

a) Fixed the wobbly/wonky scan orientation of the pages ( lots of them! ). Cleaned up some scans where possible.

b) Included all the fixes and corrected misprints from the White Dwarf article "A Fistful of Misprunts" so that this PDF is the most "correct" version of the WFRP 1st Edition rulebook out there.

The only dichotomy I came across whilst proof-reading and researching the corrections and the various printings of the book was that the first print hardback version of the rulebook with the "Fistful of Misprunts" overlaid, gives the Zombie in the bestiary an Ld score of 43 and Int of 18, whereas in the later softcover reprint the Zombie has an Ld of 10 and Int of 14.

I couldn't find any guidance online so I went with the softcover stats as they seemed more "zombie-like." I mean, how can a zombie have an Ld of 43? Maybe it is very inspiring and eloquent ?

Inspiring Zombie: "Braaains!"
Army: "Yes! Kill for our zombie leader!"
